name: hlcom
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(co(c1, c4, c3), co(c3, c4, c1)))
